Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Toto Nyasaye yafuchilila Abasuubili olwa bakhuunga omukhono hasi womusaala, Nyasaye namanya kali mumioyo chiabu, mana nabeshilia obuyeenzefu, ne na barunga obushili bwahambi
Nende omwandu kweliyie omunji kwabalabukula, na Nyasaye niwaamani owamachesi

Nyasaye yabalaka okhunyoola omwandu kweliyie omunji, mana abaranjilisiye kuno mbeli, mana niyekalila emikhono chiabandu okhuboolakhwo, ne shibe eshimanyisio khubasuubili ne abalunjisie khunjila ingololofu
Ne okundi (yetsa okhubahelesia) kwamushili okhunyoola tawe, Nyasaye yamala okhukabotokhana, Ne Nyasaye ni Omunyali wabuli eshindu
Ne abakhayi balwananga ninanyu bakhelushe nibakalukha inyuma, mana shibakhanyoolele owubalinda nohomba ubahabina tawe
Omulukha kwa Nyasaye kwabura khale, ne sholinyoola mumulukha kwa Nyasaye obukalukhani tawe
Ye niye wekalila emikhono chiabu okhuboolakhwo, ne emikhono chienyu okhuboolakhwo, mulitokha lia Makka, niyakhamala akhubaha enywe obushili khubo, ne Nyasaye alolanga po kamukholanga

Abo nibo bakhaya, mana nibabekalila okhwinjila mumusikiti kwoluyali, ne nibekalila ebisashilo (ebiayo biokhusinzwa) okhuula habundu wabio. Ne babulanga okhuba abasatsa abasuubili nende abakhasi abasuubili, abamulamanyile tawe, mwakhalwanile ninabo, mana mwenjila mububii okhurulana ninabo nimulamanyile tawe. Nyasaye (akholele kano ) khoyenjisie owayenya mutsimbabaasi tsitsie, ne bakabukhananga khwakhahele abakhayi eshinyasio eshilulu

Olwa abakhayi bara mumioyo chiabu oburuma, oburuma bwobusilu, mana Nyasaye niyeeshia obuyeenzefu khu Murumwa wuwe nende khubasuubili, ne nabalomesia likhuwa lwokhumuria, ne toto nibo bali bakhoyeshele abeenelio, ne Nyasaye yamanya muno buli eshindu
